Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2009 04:38AM iki35x wrote: I am starting to think it is related. My white cells count has been always rather lower throughout life. I finished chemotherapy+radiotherapy back in October 2007. I was getting better, feeling better until again l;ast October, little things started and I did not feel :right:. Blood test has been done, reveal low white cells count and recommended to repeat after 2 months. 19 Jan 09 repeated, still low, but a little better, recommended next after 3 months. At the time of my yearly mammogram  on 16 Feb I ended having biopsy. Exactly 2yrs on the day I was diagnosed with new tumor in other breast. My immune system could not do anything about it, But finally somebody listened and I am beeing sent to hematologist !!  I need help with this, otherwise I might well going on repeating.
Posts.Title: Immune system problems and cancer related? ailenroc orange1
